<js>
var JsDom = Packages.org.jsoup.Jsoup;
var Document = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Document;
var Element = Packages.org.jsoup.nodes.Element;
            
var document = JsDom.parse(src);
            
// è·å–åŒ…å«<li>å…ƒç´ çš„<div>å…ƒç´ 
var divs = document.select('ul.list > div');

// å°†divsè½¬æ¢ä¸ºæ•°ç»„ä»¥ä¾¿æ’åº
var divArray = [];
for (var i = 0; i < divs.size(); i++) {
    divArray.push(divs.get(i));
}

// æŒ‰ç…§data-idå±æ€§å¯¹divArrayè¿›è¡Œæ’åº
divArray.sort(function(a, b) {
    var pageA = parseInt(a.attr('data-id'), 10);
    var pageB = parseInt(b.attr('data-id'), 10);
    return pageA - pageB;
});

var list = [];
// éå†æ’åºåçš„divArray
for (var i = 0; i < divArray.length; i++) {
    var div = divArray[i];
    var dataId = div.attr('data-id');
    // è·å–å½“å‰divä¸‹çš„æ‰€æœ‰<li>å…ƒç´ 
    var lis = div.select('li');
    for (var j = 0; j < lis.size(); j++) {
        var li = lis.get(j);
        var a = li.select('a').first();
        if (a != null) {
            list.push({
                text: a.text(),
                id: dataId, // ä½¿ç”¨data-idå±æ€§
                url: a.attr('href')
            });
        }
    }
}

//java.log(JSON.stringify(list));
list;
</js>

<js>
var url = getUrl().replace(/\/$/,'')
//java.log(url)
//å¤„ç†å¼ºåˆ¶ç™»å½•
var nn = String(cookie.getCookie(url));
var coks = nn.split('; '); 
ckk = coks.filter(item => !item 
.startsWith("lf_reader_num")).join('; ');
cookie.setCookie(url,ckk);

//è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†éªŒè¯
let html = src;

function txt(sr) {
    let text;
    if (src.includes("æ»‘åŠ¨éªŒè¯")) {
        let headers = {
             'User-Agent': "Mozilla/5.0 (Windows NT 10.0; Win64; x64) AppleWebKit/537.36 (KHTML, like Gecko) Chrome/58.0.3029.110 Safari/537.36",
            "Referer": baseUrl
        };
        try {
            let s = src.match(/src=\"(\/huadong[^"]+)/)[1];
            let sr = java.get(url + s, headers).body()
            eval(sr.match(/(key=\".+?,value=\"[^;]+?\;)/)[1]);
            let va = getval(value);
            let codeul = url + sr.match(/([^"]+yanzheng_huadong\.php[^"]+)/)[1] + `${key}&value=${va}`;
            let ck = java.get(codeul, headers);
            java.log("éªŒè¯Cookieï¼š" + JSON.stringify(ck.cookies()));
            java.toast("æ£€æµ‹åˆ°éªŒè¯,å°è¯•è‡ªåŠ¨å¤„ç†â€¦â€¦");
            let tx = java.ajax(baseUrl);
            html = tx;
            text = java.getString('.read-content@html', tx);
        } catch (error) {
            java.log(error);
            text = "è‡ªåŠ¨éªŒè¯å¤±è´¥ï¼Œè¯·é‡è¯•!";
        }
    } else {
        text = java.getString('.read-content@html', src);
    }
    return text;
}

let text = txt(html);

//å¤„ç†é‡æ–°è·å–æ–‡æœ¬æ—¶å¯èƒ½ä¼šå‡ºç°çš„é”™è¯¯ã€‚
let retryCount = 0;
const maxRetries = 3;
let result;
while (retryCount < maxRetries) {
    if (text != false && text !== "") {
        result = text;
        break;
    } else {
        retryCount++;
        text = txt(html);
        Packages.java.lang.Thread.sleep(400);
        java.toast(`æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œæ­£åœ¨é‡è¯•...ï¼ˆå½“å‰ç¬¬${retryCount}æ¬¡é‡è¯•ï¼‰`);
    }
}

if (retryCount === maxRetries) {
    result = "é‡è¯•ä¸‰æ¬¡ä»ç„¶æœªè·å–åˆ°æ–‡æœ¬ï¼Œè¯·æ£€æŸ¥ç½‘ç»œçŠ¶å†µã€‚"
}
result;
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
  let defaultVariable = {
    "volume": {
      "status": false,
      "mode": 1,
      "spacer": " | ",
      "emptyVolumeName": {
        "action": false,
        "replace": "ç¬¬ä¸€å·ï¼šé»˜è®¤"
      },
      "onlyOneShow": false
    }
  }
  let variable = (book.getVariable("custom") != "" && book.getVariable("custom") != null) ? book.getVariable("custom") : source.getVariable();
  if(variable != "" && variable != null){
    try{
      variable = JSON.parse(variable);
    } catch(err) {
      java.log(err);
      variable = defaultVariable;
    }
  }
  let data = JSON.parse(result).data;
  let list = data.chapterListWithVolume;
  let volume = data.volumeNameList;
  let chapters = [];
  let volume_names = [];
  for(let i in list){
    for(let x in list[i]){
      let c = list[i][x];
      c.updateTime = java.timeFormat(c.firstPassTime * 1000);
      c.info = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.updateTime;
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 1 && volume_names.indexOf(c.volume_name) == -1){
        volume_names.push(c.volume_name);
        if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          chapters.push({
            title: ((c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace) ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name),
            isVolume: true
          });
        }
      }
      if(variable.volume.status == true && variable.volume.mode == 2){
        if(c.volume_name == "" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.action == "replace" && variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace){
          c.title = (c.volume_name == "" ? variable.volume.emptyVolumeName.replace : c.volume_name) + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        } else if(volume.length != 1 || variable.volume.onlyOneShow){
          c.title = c.volume_name + (variable.volume.spacer || " | ") + c.title;
        }
      }
      if(variable.api != "" && variable.api != null && variable.api != undefined){
        c.url = variable.api.replace("{{item_id}}", c.itemId);
        c.isVip = false;
        c.isPay = false;
      } else {
        c.url  = `https://fanqienovel.com/api/reader/full?itemId=${c.itemId}`;
        c.isPay = c.isPaidStory || c.isPaidPublication;
        c.isVip = c.isChapterLock;
      }
      chapters.push(c);
    }
  }
  chapters
</js>

ruleToc.chapterList:
<js>
result=result
aa=/\{"id":(\d+).*?\}/g
li=[]
let match
while ((match = aa.exec(result)) !== null) {
  li.push({
    id: parseInt(match[1], 10),
    content: match[0]
  });
}
li.sort((a, b) => a.id - b.id)
so=li.map(item => item.content).join(',')
s=so.replace(/^/,'{"list":[').replace(/$/,']}')
s
</js>$.list[*]
